DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize home base HIV counsel test increase male partner uptake HIV test pregnancy . The investigator study aim randomize clinical trial determine whether home-based model ( HBM ) versus partner-friendly clinic model ( PFM ) increase male uptake HIV counsel test pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Home-Based Versus Partner-Friendly Clinic Testing Enhance Male Partner HIV-1 Testing During Pregnancy
